programme.desc: The Amazing Guesser - After performing a backyard magic show with Ron, Christopher convinces himself that he actually has magical guessing powers! Christopher utilizes the help of Bubu and Ron to surprise the surprisers when they wake up!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep152
programme.desc: The Robot Player - Christopher has organized several games in the CLEARING for his friends to play. And the prize for each will be a TROPHY! The friends are super excited when Bubu brings his robot to play along with the group.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Boris / Born To Be Wild - The barbababies find a lost baby elephant and secretly look after it. How will Barbapapa and Barbamama react to Boris? // Boris the elephant misses home. The Barbapapa decide to bring him back to Africa. On the spot, they help Boris to acclimatize.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Blue's Storytime with Camila - We dive deeper into American Sign Language and the Deaf community. Camila the librarian wants to tell a story with us using ASL, but what story? We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Dora the Explorer S05 Ep517
programme.desc: Dora's Christmas Carol Adventure - Swiper is on Santa's naughty list! Dora believes Swiper can change and has to travel into the past and future to help him find 4 missing ornaments and learn the true meaning of Christmas.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Den Build Disaster/Winter Lights - Kai tries to impress with his super den, but his leaf blower invention frightens the baby animals. // Lola's plan to help a family of hedgehogs over the winter doesn't go to plan when Sir Steel wants to brighten things up.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Paddington Makes Pancakes / Paddington Plays Football - Paddington rescues Pancake Day after Mrs. Bird hurts her arms snowboarding and can't make pancakes. // Jonathan teaches Paddington football, but Paddington kicks the ball into Mr. Curry's garden. They decide to get it back by climbing over the fence.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Paddington and The Magic Trick / Paddington and Poor Mr Curry - Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a box of Magic tricks, but Paddington cannot master the tricks until he learns to practice, practice, practice. // Mr. Curry is ill and Paddington decides to nurse him back to health with his own recipe for onion soup.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep101
programme.desc: All I want for Fishmas - With Fishmas around the corner, the season's hottest toy- Burpin' Bubbz - is at the top of Baby Shark's and William's wish lists. But when Santa Jaws goes missing, it's up to them to save Fishmas if they're ever going to get their fins on that toy.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep114
programme.desc: A Pirate Christmas - Santiago and crew have to help Santa save Christmas.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S03 Ep320
programme.desc: A Very Guppy Christmas! - When Mr. Grouper's van gets stuck in the holiday snow, Mr. Claws and his horse Snowflake come to the rescue! With snow falling and bells jingling, the Guppies will experience their first sleigh ride!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S05 Ep515
programme.desc: The Guppies Save Christmas! - On Christmas Eve, Molly, Gil, and Bubble Puppy discover Santa's lost list in the snow. But to return the list safely to the North Pole, they'll have to keep it out of the hands of the Christmas-hating Humbug!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep602
programme.desc: Christmas is Coming! - On a quest to attend King Grouper's Christmas party and deliver a promised tree, Lady Oona and Lord Goby must face the ravages of winter and a mysterious Freezy Dragon, who seems intent on keeping them from the festivities.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Father Christmas! / We promise, Papa - Barbapapa tells his children about his adventurous youth... and how during a trip on the ice floe, he met Father Christmas. // When he sees the barbababies wasting water, Barbapapa takes them aside to tell them a funny story.

programme.title: Butterbean's Café S01 Ep120
programme.desc: The Sugar Plum Fairy! - It's the holiday season in Puddlebrook! When Butterbean's Sugar Plum Fairy Cake goes missing, Cricket is afraid the Sugar Plum Fairy won't visit. Will the Bean Team have a fairy happy holiday?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep127
programme.desc: Paddington Holiday Special - Paddington has accidentally sent Jonathan's Santa letter to Peru by mistake. He sends Pigeonton to the North Pole with a new list, but now he's missing. What was Jonathan's Christmas wish?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep221
programme.desc: Paddington gets locked out on Christmas Day - It's Christmas day & the Browns get locked out. Will they get in in time for dinner & still have a merry Christmas?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep247
programme.desc: Peppa's Christmas - On Christmas Eve the family set off to buy a Christmas Tree from Miss Rabbit’s tree shop. Once the tree is decorated it looks very pretty. Peppa sings a song and then it is time to go to bed. Peppa decides to stay awake and see Father Christmas.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep412
programme.desc: Santa's Grotto - Peppa and George and their friends go to see Father Christmas. Peppa asks for a very special doll as a present, but will Father Christmas be able to deliver it to her?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep413
programme.desc: Santa's Visit - Peppa and George wake up very early on Christmas morning. Has Santa delivered the presents they want?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep525
programme.desc: Mr Potato's Christmas Show - Hoor-oink! It's Christmas, and Peppa's daycare is going to the theater to see a special play about the holiday. Some people have never been to a theater before.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep253
programme.desc: Cold Winter Day - It is a cold winter day. Peppa and George want to jump in muddy puddles, but the puddles are all frozen and slippery. It begins to snow and Peppa’s friends turn up with their toboggans. Everyone has lots of fun and the day ends with a toboggan race.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Blue's Night Before Christmas - It's the night before Christmas with Josh and Blue! As we play Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants for Christmas, we decorate the tree with Steve, skidoo to Santa's Workshop, and celebrate a night full of Christmas traditions!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep307
programme.desc: Blue's Snowy Day Surprise - There are SNOW many great things to do on a snowy day like today, but Blue's surprise may be the best! We'll play a wintry game of Blue's Clues to figure out what her surprise is.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Pups Save Christmas - When Santa’s Sleigh crashes and the reindeer run off – Ryder and the PAW PATROL have to help Santa finish delivering presents and save Christmas!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep322
programme.desc: The Pups Winter Wonder Show - The Adventure Bay Snow-Show is in trouble when Mayor Humdinger escapes with the feature act: Cap’n Turbot’s performing penguins. It’s up to the Paw Patrol, with the help of Tracker, to save the day so that the show can go on!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep717
programme.desc: Pups Save a Bah Humdinger - Mayor Humdinger is being very naughty on Christmas Eve and it's up to the Paw Patrol to help Santa and save Christmas.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Monster Machine Christmas - It’s Christmas Eve, and Blaze and AJ are helping Santa and his elves load his magic bag full of presents. But Crusher, who wants to open his present early, tries to sneak into the bag and knocks it over, sending all the world’s presents flying away!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep626
programme.desc: Christmas Special - It's Christmas Eve and Blaze, AJ, Crusher, Pickle, and all their other friends are helping Santa ready his sleigh for delivery.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep615
programme.desc: Mountain Ninja Rescue - Ninjas Zooli and Oona are excited for their first mission: escorting snow monkey Moshi up Mt. Danger to join his troop! But it won't be easy: a storm looms, and mischievous Moshi is causing trouble! Will they complete their mission in time?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Thankful with Blue - Josh is making a Thankful Book and is looking to find out what our friends in the Blue's Clue's house are thankful. We play Blue's Clues to find out what Blue is thankful for and learn about patience and sharing on the way.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Our New Neighbor! - Josh and Blue have some BIG news--a new neighbor just moved in next door... it's Periwinkle! We play Blue's Clues to figure out how we can help Periwinkle feel welcome.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Darington to the Moon! - Today Darington will attempt his biggest stunt yet: rocketing to the moon! But his battery-powered rocket is out of energy. To get to the moon, Blaze must help Darington recharge his battery with all the energy they can find.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep103
programme.desc: To The Lighthouse / The Golden Giant - When a storm blows out the lighthouse light, Santi and crew hurry to guide Mami and Abuelo back from sea. // When Enrique awakens a giant, Santi and crew must find a way to save the day.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep124
programme.desc: Swimming With The Sharks - Baby and his family get their own reality TV show-- what could go wrong?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep223
programme.desc: Pups Save a Snowboard Competition / Pups Save a Chicken of the Sea - Jake and Everest are excited for the Snowboard Competition, until they see the course is buried under a blanket of snow. // When the PAW Patrol sets out to retrieve Cap'n Turbot's sunken diving bell, they meet a giant Sea Slug!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Paddington Finds A Pigeon / Paddington and Chores List - Paddington nurses a sick bird named Pigeonton back to health, but can he let him go? // The family all have chores except Paddington. So as not to be excluded, Mr. Brown creates a list for him to follow, but Paddington picks up the wrong list.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep406
programme.desc: Hospital - Peppa and her playgroup friends go with Madame Gazelle to visit Pedro Pony, who is in hospital with a broken leg.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep407
programme.desc: Spring - Grandpa Pig organises a chocolate egg hunt for Peppa and her friends. Will the piglets track down the treats?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep408

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep27
programme.desc: The Snow Po - The Kid Po have built a big and impressive Snow Po, but it keeps on blowing over. Can Team Tinpo help?

programme.desc: The Snowman Badge - The Squirrels are playing outside in the snow and decide to build a jolly-looking snowman. But when the punky penguins turn up, the fun REALLY begins!

programme.desc: The global population has now exceeded 8 billion people. In an ABC News Special Casey Briggs breaks down the facts and figures, looking at how we got here and the issues and opportunities of population growth ahead.

programme.title: ABC News Ep103
programme.desc: Miriam Corowa presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and all the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: Wildflowers Of The Midwest Of WA
programme.desc: WA's outback has come to life with a kaleidoscope of colours! ABC filmmaker Chris Lewis brings the seasonal wildflowers, stories and characters of the Midwest to the world in a unique visual style.

programme.title: ABC News Ep103
programme.desc: Miriam Corowa presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and all the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show Ep30
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - As Christmas across the Pacific beckons, the whole team, Sera, Sam, Tiana and Kiana, take a look back at their favourite stories, athletes and fans, throughout the year. (Final for 2022)

programme.title: ABC News Ep57
programme.desc: Miriam Corowa presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and all the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: The World In 2022
programme.desc: From Port Moresby's beauty queens to Russian prisoners of war, The World host Beverley O'Connor presents some of the most memorable reports from the ABC's team of international correspondents in 2022.

programme.title: ABC Evening News Ep103
programme.desc: Lara Hyams presents the latest from ABC News, covering today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and updated news from all corners of Australia and around the globe.

programme.title: Back To Nature Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Aaron and Holly yarn on Wurundjeri country near Melbourne, take in the mysteries of Hanging Rock-Ngannelong, and connect with deep time at an ancient quarry.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep52
programme.desc: Lara Hyams presents the latest from ABC News, covering today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and updated news from all corners of Australia and around the globe.

programme.desc: Join comedian and host Nazeem Hussain for the Compass Christmas Cabaret! It's Christmas like you've never seen before. One hour of multi-faith comedians, guests plus musicians including Paul Kelly and Kate Miller-Heidke.

programme.title: Christmas In Australia With Christine Anu

programme.title: Road To UFC Ep5
programme.desc: ROAD TO UFC is a ground-breaking “win and advance” tournament that gives top MMA prospects from Asia a pathway to a UFC contract. Eight mixed martial arts athletes will compete in each of four men’s weight classes: flyweight, bantamweight, featherweight and lightweight. The opening round is divided into four episodes, each of which includes four tournament bouts and one additional non-tournament bout. These non-tournament bouts are included for promising prospects whose divisions might not have been included in ROAD TO UFC.
